name: mdiapp+ SE
description: mdiapp+ SE is a paint tool for creating cartoon.It is equipped with the following convenient functions for creating a cartoon, such as:1bit/8bit layer that requires a small memory consumption (the standard color layers are also available)Project management window that enables to organize the cartoon pages3D Perspective tool for drawing...
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows 7 or Later Processor: Pentium 4 Memory: 2 GB RAM Storage: 100 MB available space
